marklogic.body:
Places are still up for grabs next to Messi. There are no certain starters there, and luckily for Afellay, if he impresses, he will have one of those Spots.
If we sign a forward, which I doubt, but you never know, we might loan out the t]wo 20 year olds Cuenca and Tello next season for them to get some playing time and develop further. Not many expected them to Reach this level when they where in the youth system, and nobody really knows how good they are and how good they can become and a year out on loan might give us some of these answers.

object.displayName: Comment on Happy Birthday, Ibrahim Afellay! by words

marklogic.displayName: words commented on Happy Birthday, Ibrahim Afellay!
